description:
Explore wonderful worlds as you lead Ninja Buddy in his quest to save Princess Zebda.

Show your skills to master hostile monsters, deadly mechanics and powerful bosses.

Make your way through increasingly challenging levels in this Super Platformer. 

Main Features:
-30 Lengthy levels throughout different worlds
-Bosses at each levels
-Cute Sprites and Animations
-Collect coins to upgrade your character in the virtual shop (all games features available without any extra purchase, you play to win!)
-Many Different enemies
-Multi-skilled Ninja: sword, dart, dash, wall climbing...
-Dedicated Music and Sound FX (optional)


Ready for an Epic Adventure?
name: Ninja Buddy Epic Quest
